Texts.Chs: 把这个^orange;硅板^reset;带给^green;我^reset;，地点是^orange;科学前哨站^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;silicon board^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 提醒：你会需要大量的硅板的，因为制造更先进的芯片的过程中都需要他们。
Texts.Eng: Encouraging: You will need a large amount of boards, for they are the building block of many more advanced chipsets.

Texts.Chs: 教程：现在你有一些硅和铜线了，为什么不通过^orange;物质汇编机^reset;把他们制成^orange;硅板^reset;呢？
Texts.Eng: Instructive: Now that you have silicon and wire why not combine the two at your ^orange;matter assembler^reset; and craft a ^orange;Silicon Board^reset;?
